meanings.definition: To restore industrial activity in (an area)
meanings.sent1: The government plans to reindustrializes the old factory district.
meanings.sent2: The city council hopes to reindustrializes the abandoned warehouses.
meanings.sent3: The mayor's idea to reindustrializes the park with factories was met with laughter.
meanings.sent4: The community's effort to reindustrializes the town breathed new life into the economy.
meanings.sent5: The initiative to reindustrializes the region sparked job opportunities for many.

meanings.definition: To bring back or increase industrial production in (a country)
meanings.sent1: The new policy aims to reindustrializes the nation's manufacturing sector.
meanings.sent2: The economic reforms are expected to reindustrializes the country's economy.
meanings.sent3: The plan to reindustrializes the country with modern factories excited investors.
meanings.sent4: The visionary leader's goal to reindustrializes the nation inspired hope in the people.
meanings.sent5: The decision to reindustrializes the country's infrastructure will create jobs for many.
